abstract: A singer who was protesting decades before most of the Wall Street demonstrators were born lent his support to their cause.
snippet: A singer who was protesting decades before most of the Wall Street demonstrators were born lent his support to their cause.
lead_paragraph: The Occupy Wall Street protests have drawn their share of musical supporters over the past few weeks. On Friday night, Pete Seeger lent his voice to the cause, though the protesters had to go uptown to hear it.

headline.main: Pete Seeger Leads Protesters, on Foot and in Song
